mapper.select:
SELECT tt.orgId ,tt.advisorAccount ,tt.advisorName ,tt.businessArea ,tt.avatar ,tt.position ,tt.workingYears ,tt.orgName ,tt.isCertification ,tt.goodAtBusiness ,tt.transactionNum ,tt.pageviews ,tt.evaluationScore ,tt.evaluationNum ,(tt.evaluationScore* #{praiseWeight}+tt.pageviews* #{popularityWeight} +tt.transactionNum* #{serviceWeight} + #{otherFactorScore} )AS "integratedSort" FROM ( SELECT sa.`org_id` AS "orgId" ,sa.`org_name` AS "orgName" ,sa.`advisor_account` AS "advisorAccount" ,sa.`advisor_name` AS "advisorName" ,sa.`business_area` AS "businessArea" ,sa.`avatar` AS "avatar" ,sa.`position` AS "position" ,sa.working_years as "workingYears" ,sa.`is_certification` AS "isCertification" ,sa.`good_at_business` AS "goodAtBusiness" ,IFNULL(sa.`transaction_num`,0) AS "transactionNum" ,IFNULL(sa.page_views,0) AS "pageviews" ,IFNULL(AVG(sr.`attitude_score`),0) AS "evaluationScore" ,COUNT(sr.`attitude_score`) AS "evaluationNum" FROM tb_service_advisor sa LEFT JOIN tb_service_rating sr ON sa.`advisor_account` = sr.`advisor_account` where 1=1 and sa.approval_status='2' and sa.record_status='1' GROUP BY sa.`org_id`,sa.`advisor_account`,sa.`advisor_name`,sa.`business_area`, sa.`avatar`,sa.`position`,sa.working_years,sa.`org_name`,sa.`is_certification`, sa.`good_at_business`,sa.`transaction_num`,sa.page_views )tt where 1=1
and tt.businessArea=#{domain}
and tt.orgId=#{orgId}
and (tt.advisorName like '%'||#{domain}||'%' or tt.position like '%'||#{domain}||'%')
ORDER BY (tt.evaluationScore * #{praiseWeight}+tt.pageviews* #{popularityWeight} +tt.transactionNum* #{serviceWeight} + #{otherFactorScore} ) DESC
ORDER BY tt.pageviews DESC
ORDER BY tt.evaluationScore DESC
ORDER BY tt.transactionNum DESC
